fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - AAAAAAUAHFOAUEHFGOAAAA a player at night, killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first time you AAAAAAUAHFOAUEHFGOAAAA a town role, you join a random evil faction with at least one living member.
- The second time you AAAAAAUAHFOAUEHFGOAAAA a town role, your role is revealed.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, your other attributes do not exist, but you only get 3 uses of your ability.
